import React from 'react' const Item = ({data}) => { const {id,name,middle_name,surname,area,stream,std,topper,university,achievement_details,achievement_image,college_name,profile_image} = data; let first_letter=name.substr(0,1); return (

{first_letter}

Hi, I'm {name} {middle_name} {surname} from {area}, pursuing {std} {stream} from {college_name} from {university}.

{std}{std}{stream}{area}
) } export default Item
